thread.title: General Motors Company to Host “Behind the Charts” Conference Call
thread.title_full: General Motors Company to Host “Behind the Charts” Conference Call

title: General Motors Company to Host “Behind the Charts” Conference Call
text:
General Motors Company to Host "Behind the Charts" Conference Call Thu, Jun 25 2015 
General Motors Company will host a "Behind the Charts" conference call for analysts and institutional investors on Thursday June 25th at 10:00am EDT. This event is intended to provide insight with regard to GM's financial reporting as well as to answer frequently asked questions from the investment community. The call will be hosted by Tom Timko, Vice President, Controller & Chief Accounting Officer. Following the presentation will be a question and answer session for analysts. The call-in numbers are: +1-949-484-0645 (International/caller-paid) Conference Call Name: GM Behind the Charts 
Please dial in at least 15 minutes in advance to ensure you are connected to the call. A live audio webcast of the conference call will be accessible on our investor website on this page, under "Related Resources" along with the presentation. A taped replay of the conference call will be available from 1:30 p.m. ET, June 25, 2015 until 11:59 p.m. ET, July 1, 2015. Dial 855-859-2056 (or +1-404-537-3406 for international access) and enter conference ID number 63823524 to access the replay. Additionally, a replay of the audio webcast will be available immediately following the call.
